item.description:
We had a great time here in March, so let's all meet up for dinner/drinks at Orleans in Davis Sq. again.

We will go to Orleans, we will have fun meeting like minded people, and we will enjoy a few choice beverages.
item.how_to_find_us: If you get there before 7pm, hang out by the hostess podium or grab a drink at the bar. Winfield should arrive shortly before 7. We will be hanging out in the bar area until 1/2 the people show up. Then at a large table in back.
item.why: The Boston Atheists are a loosely knit group of people who all share some discontent with the religous and cultural status quo. We've all rejected the easy answers for very different reasons, but somehow we all find common ground.
item.name: The Boston Atheists May Meeting
